restaurantName: Antica Locanda al Cervo - Landgasthof zum Hirschen
description: Enjoy generous, regional cuisine influenced by the family’s involvement in the cattle and horse farming business, either in the restaurant’s welcoming dining rooms or on its sunny panoramic terrace. “Zero food miles” produce is much more than a simple slogan here!
